hanzi-su-wiki:
週

Значения

Неделя, круг, цикл

Мнемоника

  • Цикл вращения 周, движение 辶 с возвратом к исходной точке. Неделя как повторение дней.

  • "Это займёт неделю, чтобы возвратиться 周 назад по этой дороге."

Варианты

周
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhōu
week; turn, cycle; anniversary
неделю; поворот, цикл; Годовщина

purpleculture_info: Ideographic: To walk 辶 in a circle 周; 周 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
週邊 [ zhōu biān ]: periphery; rim; also written 周邊 |周边
週長 [ zhōu cháng ]: variant of 周長 |周长 , perimeter; circumference
週圍 [ zhōu wéi ]: variant of 周圍 |周围 , surroundings; environment; to encompass
週游 [ zhōu yóu ]: variant of 周遊 |周游 , to tour; to travel around
週遊 [ zhōu yóu ]: variant of 周遊 |周游 , to tour; to travel around
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 周 [ zhōu ] Zhou dynasty; circumference
heisig_chinese_memo: Imagine a road built so well that it takes only a week to travel the circumference of the earth.
heisig_constituent: week, circumference, running track, earthenware jar, lidded crock, soil, dirt, ground, mouth, road
heisig_story: Picture a circular road with 7 markers on it, one for each day of the week. When you have walked one complete lap on this road, you shall have completed one week.
koohiiStory1: Imagine a road built so well that it takes only a week to travel the circumference of the earth.
koohiiStory2: Actually the week is like a never ending road where we travel in a circle through the same seven days again and again, the circumference is always the same. circumference (#317) also means circuit or lap, so that also makes think about the rotations of the moon, sun and the earth -- all important for measuring all kinds of time periods.
jp_example_words:
隔週(かくしゅう): every other week
週間(しゅうかん): week, weekly
再来週(さらいしゅう): week after next
週(しゅう): week
先々週(せんせんしゅう): week before last
さ来週(さらいしゅう): the week after next
今週(こんしゅう): this week
先週(せんしゅう): last week, the week before
毎週(まいしゅう): every week
来週(らいしゅう): next week
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Use a scooter to travel the circumference of the world and it will take you a full week. Seven whole days!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: A week in earth time is also known as a "full scoot" in scooter lingo. ;)
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you want to scoot for a week, you'll need shoes. Good shoes too, not sandals or high heels or boots. Solid, high quality shoes, so you don't fall off the scooter and hurt yourself.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You can't ride a scooter for a week barefoot, are you nuts?! Get some shoes!
Ru_Radicals: 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 込 (внутрь), 口 (рот), 土 (земля)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the circumference (周) moves (⻌) for a week
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Imagine a road built so well that it takes only a week to travel the circumference of the earth.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵" to " Zhou " sound. " Week " is the last word of " week ". "Zhengzitong": "Zhou, the vulgar word for Zhou." " Zhou " means around, all around. For example, Yan Zhenqing of the Tang Dynasty "Inscription of Miaoxi Temple in Zhushan, Wucheng County, Huzhou": "Emperor Wen of Tang Taizong moved to this mountain in spring and February in the sixth year of his ascension. The mountain is three hundred feet high, and the cover It was the place to visit Chunan in the past summer." "Water Margin" Chapter 19: "It turns out that this Shijie Village lake is next to Liangshan and the river is surrounded by deep water streams and reeds and grasses." Then he said. Such as Ye Mengzhu in the Qing Dynasty, "Yue Shi Bian. "Construction": "Fang Guang has more than a hundred steps, the outer walls are earthen walls, and the inner columns contain warehouses."

" Week " means cycle. For example, Tang Dezong's "Nan Xiaoxiewen": "The frontier army guards and the soldiers guarding the autumn. Those who have not changed after the third anniversary are suitable for Zhen Xu." Guan Hanqing of the Yuan Dynasty "Zhao Pan'er Fengyue Saves the Wind and Dust" first fold: "Get married At his house, there is no such thing as anniversaries for half a year."

" Week " also means full, full, and full. For example, Song Yue Zhuxian of the Tang Dynasty "Marriage Poems": "The Jiazi in the world is a thousand years old, and the spiritual world cup is the first day of the tour." Yuan Dynasty Anonymous "Wu Su Nian": "The change is endless, the inclusion is endless, the use is without trace. The void is broken, and the light is everywhere. Zhou Wuji."

" Zhou " can also be used as a quantifier. For example, the 39th chapter of the "Biography of the Heroes of the Sons and Daughters" of Wenkang in the Qing Dynasty: "The master has watched for a week but never saw his aunt and grandma; only then did he ask about it, and also asked what happened to his family today." Week, such as "this week", "next week".
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵" to " Zhou " sound. " Week " is the last word of " week ".
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「周」聲。「週」是「周」的後起字。《正字通》：「週，俗周字。」「週」表示周圍、四周。如唐代顏真卿〈湖州烏程縣杼山妙喜寺碑銘〉：「唐太宗文皇帝升極之六年春二月，移於此山，山高三百尺，週迴一千二百步，蓋昔夏杼南巡之所。」《水滸全傳》第19回：「原來這石碣村湖泊，正傍著梁山水泊，週 圍盡是深港水汊，蘆葦草蕩。」又表示環繞。如清代葉夢珠《閱世編．建設》：「方廣百餘步，外週土垣，內列含倉廩。」

　　「週」表示周期。如唐德宗〈南效赦文〉：「邊軍鎮守及諸道諸軍防秋將士，經三週年未改轉者，宜與甄敘。」元代關漢卿《趙盼兒風月救風塵》第一折：「娶到他家裡，多無半載週年相棄擲。」

　　「週」也表示遍、全、滿。如唐代嵩嶽諸仙〈嫁女詩〉：「人間甲子週千歲，靈境杯觴初一巡。」元代無名氏〈無俗念〉：「變化無窮，包含不盡，運用無蹤跡。虛空打破，光明遍週無極。」

　　「週」還可作量詞。如清代文康《兒女英雄傳》第39回：「老爺看了一週只不曾見著他家那位姨奶奶；纔要問起，還要問問他家今日到底是有件甚麼事。」又表示星期，如「本週」、「下週」。
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「周」聲。「週」是「周」的後起字。

從「 辵 」，「 周 」聲。「 週 」是「 周 」的後起字。《正字通》：「週，俗周字。」「 週 」表示周圍、四周。如唐代顏真卿〈湖州烏程縣杼山妙喜寺碑銘〉：「唐太宗文皇帝升極之六年春二月，移於此山，山高三百尺，週迴一千二百步，蓋昔夏杼南巡之所。」《水滸全傳》第19回：「原來這石碣村湖泊，正傍著梁山水泊，週 圍盡是深港水汊，蘆葦草蕩。」又表示環繞。如清代葉夢珠《閱世編．建設》：「方廣百餘步，外週土垣，內列含倉廩。」 「 週 」表示周期。如唐德宗〈南效赦文〉：「邊軍鎮守及諸道諸軍防秋將士，經三週年未改轉者，宜與甄敘。」元代關漢卿《趙盼兒風月救風塵》第一折：「娶到他家裡，多無半載週年相棄擲。」 「 週 」也表示遍、全、滿。如唐代嵩嶽諸仙〈嫁女詩〉：「人間甲子週千歲，靈境杯觴初一巡。」元代無名氏〈無俗念〉：「變化無窮，包含不盡，運用無蹤跡。虛空打破，光明遍週無極。」 「 週 」還可作量詞。如清代文康《兒女英雄傳》第39回：「老爺看了一週只不曾見著他家那位姨奶奶；纔要問起，還要問問他家今日到底是有件甚麼事。」又表示星期，如「本週」、「下週」。

Such as Ye Mengzhu in the Qing Dynasty, "Yue Shi Bian. "Construction": "Fang Guang has more than a hundred steps, the outer walls are earthen walls, and the inner columns contain warehouses." 週字的基本解释

週
zhōu
同“周”①週③。

週字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhōu］
［《玉篇》職由切］
同“周1”。
(1)周围。
(2)环绕。
(3)遍及；全。
(4)满。谓满一个周期。
(5)指一个甲子六十年。甲子六十年一循环，故称。
(6)周年。指一年、一岁。
(7)指一星期。
(8)量词。匝，圈。

週字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　週； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1259第24
【玉篇】職由切。與周同。【字彙】迴也。

週字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
週字的起名意思

环绕，循环；圈子，四围；遍及，普遍；时期的一轮。

week
Basic explanation of words
week
zhōu
Same as "week"①week③.
week
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhōu］
["Jade Pian" job by cutting]
Same as "Week 1".
(1) Around.
(2) Surround.
(3) All over; all.
(4) Full. That is a full cycle.
(5) Refers to a Jiazi for sixty years. Jiazi has a cycle of sixty years, so it is called.
(6) Anniversary. Refers to one year, one year old.
(7) Refers to a week.
(8) Quantifiers. Turn, circle.
week

Name meaning

zhōu
вм. 周

週

Значения

Неделя, круг, цикл

Мнемоника

  • Цикл вращения 周, движение 辶 с возвратом к исходной точке. Неделя как повторение дней.

  • "Это займёт неделю, чтобы возвратиться 周 назад по этой дороге."

Варианты

周

Radicals: 周  (circumference, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
Use a scooter to travel the circumference of the world and it will take you a full week. Seven whole days!
A week in earth time is also known as a "full scoot" in scooter lingo. ;)
Reading Mnemonic
If you want to scoot for a week, you'll need shoes. Good shoes too, not sandals or high heels or boots. Solid, high quality shoes, so you don't fall off the scooter and hurt yourself.
You can't ride a scooter for a week barefoot, are you nuts?! Get some shoes!
